verses.verse: And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out from the temple <S%G2413><s%> and was going <S%G4198><s%> away <S%G4198><s%> when <S%G2532><s%> His disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> up to point <S%G1925><s%> out the temple <S%G2413><s%> buildings <S%G3619><s%> to Him.

And He answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Do you not see <S%G991><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%>? Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, not one stone <S%G3037><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> shall be left <S%G863><s%> upon another, <S%G3037><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> will not be torn <S%G2647><s%> down. <S%G2647><s%>"

And as He was sitting <S%G2521><s%> on the Mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives, <S%G1636><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to Him privately, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Tell <S%G3004><s%> us, when <S%G4219><s%> will these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> be, and what <S%G5101><s%> [will be] the sign <S%G4592><s%> of Your coming, <S%G3952><s%> and of the end <S%G4930><s%> of the age <S%G165><s%>?"
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "See <S%G991><s%> to it that no <S%G3361><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> misleads <S%G4105><s%> you.
"For many <S%G4183><s%> will come <S%G2064><s%> in My name, <S%G3686><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'I am <S%G1510><s%> the Christ, <S%G5547><s%>' and will mislead <S%G4105><s%> many. <S%G4183><s%>

"And you will <S%G3195><s%> be hearing <S%G191><s%> of wars <S%G4171><s%> and rumors <S%G189><s%> of wars; <S%G4171><s%> see <S%G3708><s%> that you are not frightened, <S%G2360><s%> for [those things] must <S%G1163><s%> take <S%G1096><s%> place, <S%G1096><s%> but [that] is not yet <S%G3768><s%> the end. <S%G5056><s%>

"For nation <S%G1484><s%> will rise <S%G1453><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> nation, <S%G1484><s%> and kingdom <S%G932><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> kingdom, <S%G932><s%> and in various <S%G2596><s%> places <S%G5117><s%> there will be famines <S%G3042><s%> and earthquakes. <S%G4578><s%>
"But all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> are [merely] the beginning <S%G746><s%> of birth <S%G5604><s%> pangs. <S%G5604><s%>

"Then <S%G5119><s%> they will deliver <S%G3860><s%> you to tribulation, <S%G2347><s%> and will kill <S%G615><s%> you, and you will be hated <S%G3404><s%> by all <S%G3956><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> on account <S%G1223><s%> of My name. <S%G3686><s%>

"And at that time <S%G5119><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> will fall <S%G4624><s%> away <S%G4624><s%> and will deliver <S%G3860><s%> up one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> and hate <S%G3404><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>
"And many <S%G4183><s%> false <S%G5578><s%> prophets <S%G5578><s%> will arise, <S%G1453><s%> and will mislead <S%G4105><s%> many. <S%G4183><s%>
"And because <S%G1223><s%> lawlessness <S%G458><s%> is increased, <S%G4129><s%> most <S%G4183><s%> people's love <S%G26><s%> will grow <S%G5594><s%> cold. <S%G5594><s%>
"But the one who endures <S%G5278><s%> to the end, <S%G5056><s%> he shall be saved. <S%G4982><s%>

"And this <S%G3778><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> shall be preached <S%G2784><s%> in the whole <S%G3650><s%> world <S%G3625><s%> for a witness <S%G3142><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the nations, <S%G1484><s%> and then <S%G5119><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%> shall come. <S%G2240><s%>

"Therefore <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> you see <S%G3708><s%> the abomination <S%G946><s%> of desolation <S%G2050><s%> which was spoken <S%G3004><s%> of through <S%G1223><s%> Daniel <S%G1158><s%> the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> in the holy <S%G40><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> (let the reader <S%G314><s%> understand <S%G3539><s%>),
then <S%G5119><s%> let those <S%G3588><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> are in Judea <S%G2453><s%> flee <S%G5343><s%> to the mountains; <S%G3735><s%>
let him who <S%G3588><s%> is on the housetop <S%G1430><s%> not go <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> to get <S%G142><s%> the things out that are in his house; <S%G3614><s%>
and let him who <S%G3588><s%> is in the field <S%G68><s%> not turn <S%G1994><s%> back <S%G3694><s%> <S%G1994><s%> to get <S%G142><s%> his cloak. <S%G2440><s%>

"But woe <S%G3759><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who are with child <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1064><s%> and to those <S%G3588><s%> who nurse <S%G2337><s%> babes <S%G2337><s%> in those <S%G1565><s%> days! <S%G2250><s%>
"But pray <S%G4336><s%> that your flight <S%G5437><s%> may not be in the winter, <S%G5494><s%> or <S%G3366><s%> on a Sabbath; <S%G4521><s%>

for then <S%G5119><s%> there will be a great <S%G3173><s%> tribulation, <S%G2347><s%> such <S%G3634><s%> as has not occurred <S%G1096><s%> since <S%G575><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> now, <S%G3568><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> ever <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> shall.

"And unless <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> had been cut <S%G2856><s%> short, <S%G2856><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3956><s%> life <S%G4561><s%> would have been saved; <S%G4982><s%> but for the sake <S%G1223><s%> of the elect <S%G1588><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> shall be cut <S%G2856><s%> short. <S%G2856><s%>

"Then <S%G5119><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> to you, 'Behold, <S%G2400><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> is the Christ, <S%G5547><s%>' or <S%G2228><s%> 'There <S%G5602><s%> [He is,]' do not believe <S%G4100><s%> [him.]

"For false <S%G5580><s%> Christs <S%G5580><s%> and false <S%G5578><s%> prophets <S%G5578><s%> will arise <S%G1453><s%> and will show <S%G1325><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> and wonders, <S%G5059><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> as to mislead, <S%G4105><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> possible, <S%G1415><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the elect. <S%G1588><s%>
"Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I have told <S%G4275><s%> you in advance. <S%G4275><s%>

"If <S%G1437><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> they say <S%G3004><s%> to you, 'Behold, <S%G2400><s%> He is in the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%>' do not go <S%G1831><s%> forth, <S%G1831><s%> [or,] 'Behold, <S%G2400><s%> He is in the inner <S%G5009><s%> rooms, <S%G5009><s%>' do not believe <S%G4100><s%> [them.]

"For just <S%G5618><s%> as the lightning <S%G796><s%> comes <S%G1831><s%> from the east, <S%G395><s%> and flashes <S%G5316><s%> even <S%G2193><s%> to the west, <S%G1424><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> shall the coming <S%G3952><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> be.
"Wherever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G1437><s%> the corpse <S%G4430><s%> is, there <S%G1563><s%> the vultures <S%G105><s%> will gather. <S%G4863><s%>

"But immediately <S%G2112><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> the tribulation <S%G2347><s%> of those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> will be darkened, <S%G4654><s%> and the moon <S%G4582><s%> will not give <S%G1325><s%> its light, <S%G5338><s%> and the stars <S%G792><s%> will fall <S%G4098><s%> from the sky, <S%G3772><s%> and the powers <S%G1411><s%> of the heavens <S%G3772><s%> will be shaken, <S%G4531><s%>

and then <S%G5119><s%> the sign <S%G4592><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> will appear <S%G5316><s%> in the sky, <S%G3772><s%> and then <S%G5119><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the tribes <S%G5443><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> will mourn, <S%G2875><s%> and they will see <S%G3708><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> on the clouds <S%G3507><s%> of the sky <S%G3772><s%> with power <S%G1411><s%> and great <S%G4183><s%> glory. <S%G1391><s%>

"And He will send <S%G649><s%> forth <S%G649><s%> His angels <S%G32><s%> with a great <S%G3173><s%> trumpet <S%G4536><s%> and they will gather <S%G1996><s%> together <S%G1996><s%> His elect <S%G1588><s%> from the four <S%G5064><s%> winds, <S%G417><s%> from one end <S%G206><s%> of the sky <S%G3772><s%> to the other. <S%G206><s%>

"Now <S%G1161><s%> learn <S%G3129><s%> the parable <S%G3850><s%> from the fig <S%G4808><s%> tree: <S%G4808><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> its branch <S%G2798><s%> has already <S%G2235><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> tender, <S%G527><s%> and puts <S%G1631><s%> forth <S%G1631><s%> its leaves, <S%G5444><s%> you know <S%G1097><s%> that summer <S%G2330><s%> is near; <S%G1451><s%>

even so <S%G3779><s%> you too, <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> you see <S%G3708><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things, <S%G3778><s%> recognize <S%G1097><s%> that He is near, <S%G1451><s%> [right] at the door. <S%G2374><s%>

"Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, this <S%G3778><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> will not pass <S%G3928><s%> away <S%G3928><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> take <S%G1096><s%> place. <S%G1096><s%>
"Heaven <S%G3772><s%> and earth <S%G1093><s%> will pass <S%G3928><s%> away, <S%G3928><s%> but My words <S%G3056><s%> shall not pass <S%G3928><s%> away. <S%G3928><s%>

"But of that day <S%G2250><s%> and hour <S%G5610><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> knows, <S%G3609><s%> not even <S%G3761><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> of heaven, <S%G3772><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> the Son, <S%G5207><s%> but the Father <S%G3962><s%> alone. <S%G3441><s%>
"For the coming <S%G3952><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> will be just <S%G5618><s%> like <S%G5618><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of Noah. <S%G3575><s%>

"For as in those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> which were before <S%G4253><s%> the flood <S%G2627><s%> they were eating <S%G5176><s%> and drinking, <S%G4095><s%> they were marrying <S%G1060><s%> and giving <S%G7031><s%> in marriage, <S%G7031><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> that Noah <S%G3575><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> the ark, <S%G2787><s%>

and they did not understand <S%G1097><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> the flood <S%G2627><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and took <S%G142><s%> them all <S%G537><s%> away; <S%G142><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> shall the coming <S%G3952><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> be.
"Then <S%G5119><s%> there shall be two <S%G1417><s%> men <S%G1417><s%> in the field; <S%G68><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> will be taken, <S%G3880><s%> and one <S%G1520><s%> will be left. <S%G863><s%>
"Two <S%G1417><s%> women [will be] grinding <S%G229><s%> at the mill; <S%G3458><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> will be taken, <S%G3880><s%> and one <S%G1520><s%> will be left. <S%G863><s%>
"Therefore <S%G3767><s%> be on the alert, <S%G1127><s%> for you do not know <S%G3609><s%> which <S%G4169><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> your Lord <S%G2962><s%> is coming. <S%G2064><s%>

"But be sure <S%G1097><s%> of this, <S%G1565><s%> that if <S%G1487><s%> the head <S%G3617><s%> of the house <S%G3617><s%> had known <S%G3609><s%> at what <S%G4169><s%> time <S%G5438><s%> of the night <S%G5438><s%> the thief <S%G2812><s%> was coming, <S%G2064><s%> he would have been on the alert <S%G1127><s%> and would not have allowed <S%G1439><s%> his house <S%G3614><s%> to be broken <S%G1358><s%> into.

"For this <S%G3778><s%> reason <S%G1223><s%> you be ready <S%G2092><s%> too; <S%G2532><s%> for the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> is coming <S%G2064><s%> at an hour <S%G5610><s%> when <S%G3739><s%> you do not think <S%G1380><s%> [He will.]

"Who <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G686><s%> is the faithful <S%G4103><s%> and sensible <S%G5429><s%> slave <S%G1401><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> his master <S%G2962><s%> put <S%G2525><s%> in charge <S%G2525><s%> of his household <S%G3610><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> them their food <S%G5160><s%> at the proper <S%G2540><s%> time <S%G2540><s%>?
"Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is that slave <S%G1401><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> his master <S%G2962><s%> finds <S%G2147><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> doing <S%G4160><s%> when he comes. <S%G2064><s%>
"Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, that he will put <S%G2525><s%> him in charge <S%G2525><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> his possessions. <S%G5225><s%>

"But if <S%G1437><s%> that evil <S%G2556><s%> slave <S%G1401><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> in his heart, <S%G2588><s%> 'My master <S%G2962><s%> is not coming <S%G5549><s%> for a long <S%G5549><s%> time, <S%G5549><s%>'
and shall begin <S%G757><s%> to beat <S%G5180><s%> his fellow <S%G4889><s%> slaves <S%G4889><s%> and eat <S%G2068><s%> and drink <S%G4095><s%> with drunkards; <S%G3184><s%>

the master <S%G2962><s%> of that slave <S%G1401><s%> will come <S%G2240><s%> on a day <S%G2250><s%> when <S%G3739><s%> he does not expect <S%G4328><s%> [him] and at an hour <S%G5610><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he does not know, <S%G1097><s%>

and shall cut <S%G1371><s%> him in pieces <S%G1371><s%> and assign <S%G5087><s%> him a place <S%G3313><s%> with the hypocrites; <S%G5273><s%> weeping <S%G2805><s%> shall be there <S%G1563><s%> and the gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth. <S%G3599><s%>
